author: Shi Xuan Teng
text:
Manager of the branch is rude and unprofessional and keep claiming that she is professional. I had an escalation with their staff with regards to cancellation and they said will escalate to their manager. However after 2.5 weeks I reached out again to them they said I had already escalated but however there's no return call from the manager till I nudge them again.

However 'professional' they claimed to be; it just seems like they are not helping members to get the necessary done.. manager keep reinforcing that its stated clearly in the contract.. like duh.. i know it is in the contract.. but if that so IMPORTANT.. you could had directed your members to that clause at the point of sign up and not telling members that your contract stated so when they tries to terminate.

Staff isn't any better; no push no work, very difficult.. think twice before you sign up with AF. Never had any issues with other gyms.

author: Nandhitha shree
text: Place went through recent renovations to have double the space as before. Multiple classes and machines were added! Really love the changes! Has all the necessary machines ‚ò∫Ô∏è

author: Spartan Dan
text:
Quite a small gym. But sufficient for my needs. 2 half rack, one smith, dumbbell racks and machines.
Sadly no deadlift platform.. and no toilet inside. Need to walk abit to go toilet and change up.
Free weights corner also quite cramp.
People need to squeeze through. But overall equipment all top notch and new. Nice. Place

author: A M
text:
Very cozy and super clean gym. Gym equipment is new. Has sufficient space to do workouts and run with friends.

Currently gymming during CNY, so the gym is relatively empty. Place has no toilet nor drinking fountain inside gym, so everything needs to be done outside gym.

Overall 5 stars!

author: gghoulish
text: Very nice facility, with a fair anount of equipments, and conveniently located in a small plaza. Kind staffs that are willing to assist you, and the vibe in the gym is quite upbeat, as well as having clean equipments.

author: Iskandar J.
text:
Big space, staff name Khai very friendly. TAHSEEN... What can I say about her? Such a nice manager! Very welcoming!

It reminds me of my home club at Tengah.

author: Lam Ahmad
text: Amazing Service by Tahseen herself. She really explained in detailed and giving her best her task and ensure we are well understand in what we are signing up for the packages...

author: B Chin
text:
I had a very disappointing experience at this gym. First of all, the space is extremely small and overcrowded. Even after their recent expansion, it‚Äôs still cramped, and you constantly feel like you‚Äôre going to bump into someone or get hit by equipment. It‚Äôs not a comfortable or safe environment to work out in.

Another major issue is the lack of gym machines. There are far too few for the number of people using the gym, and they‚Äôre always occupied. You end up wasting so much time waiting around, which makes it impossible to stick to a workout routine.

The staff is also incredibly unhelpful. While I knew about the free month promotion, they never informed me when it was available to redeem. It felt like they were intentionally keeping it vague to avoid giving members the benefit. And when I finally redeemed it, I was hit with another issue‚Äîthey wouldn‚Äôt let me cancel my membership immediately after the free month ended. Instead, I was forced to wait until the membership period was over, which meant they charged me for an additional month I didn‚Äôt want.

Overall, this gym feels more like a money grab than a place that cares about its members. I wouldn‚Äôt recommend it to anyone.

author: Su
text:
I'm incredibly thankful to Tahseen for her responsiveness and for helping me with the termination process, even though I'm from a different outlet. Terminations are time-sensitive, and I was really frustrated when my home gym team was not responding at all. It got to the point where I seriously considered never returning to Anytime Fitness.

But the moment Tahseen stepped in, everything changed. She was prompt, clear, and genuinely kind ‚Äî she didn‚Äôt have to help, but she did, and she did it so professionally. It reminded me that there are still team members like her in this network who care and go the extra mile. Her support turned what could‚Äôve been a very negative experience into one that left me feeling heard and respected.

Thank you Tahseen, for leaving such a positive impression. AF is lucky to have you and as long as there are team members like you around, I would want to return to AF.

author: FDS 607
text: Predeep is friendly is knowkedge n friendly. He is akways keen to share and help. Other staffs are friendly heloful too. Good facilities and stations

author: Lawrence Lim
text:
It had been a good journey with AF Sunshine Place. As the gym is small, the place is getting more and more crowd. Sometimes I walk in and walk out the next minute.

The missing stars. A disappointment when my membership was turned inactive one day before my contract ended. Later it was clarified as a ‚Äútechnical glitch‚Äù and I could visit on the last day during manned hours. What a joke!

author: evan
text: Anytime Fitness is an amazing gym with a welcoming atmosphere and great equipment. A special shoutout to Bella, whose positive energy and support make every visit a joy. She‚Äôs always helpful, friendly, and truly cares about the members. Highly recommend!

author: Muhammad
text:
Extremely fun workout program for beginners conducted by Marissa. She teaches both the correct form and also how to use the gym equipments. Definitely a no-pressure, beginner friendly program.

Gym is unfortunately on the smaller side, with no shower facilities. Equipments and facilities are clean and fully functioning, just currently the space is cramped. But they are expanding the gym this year, so this is probably a temporary issue that will be resolved soon.

author: Hansel Wong
text: My second home üôÇ‚Äç‚ÜïÔ∏è the nicest group of staff,  they are so attentive and passionate about promoting a friendly and judgement-free space ‚Ä¶

author: Ke Sheng Loo
text: Disappointed as a 3-years member. Was told that I have to follow the In-house rule to serve another month of notice after member termination notice which I was not informed in the first place. Branch manager could not retrieve the contract I signed, didn‚Äôt try to work around any other alternatives and told me off to made my last payment even i will not be able to utilise the gym anymore due to relocation reason.

author: CheeKeong Leow
text:
As a dedicated kettlebell enthusiast, I was thoroughly impressed by the gym's facilities. The spacious layout provides plenty of room to perform a wide range of kettlebell exercises without feeling cramped or restricted. Whether you're into swings, cleans, presses, or Turkish get-ups, the open floor plan ensures you can move freely and safely.

What truly sets this gym apart is its diverse selection of kettlebells. They offer a comprehensive range of weights, catering to beginners just starting out and experienced lifters seeking a more challenging workout. The equipment is well-maintained, ensuring a comfortable grip and consistent performance during workouts.

For anyone passionate about kettlebell training, this gym delivers the perfect environment to hone your skills, build strength, and achieve your fitness goals. I highly recommend it for both seasoned lifters and those looking to explore the versatility of kettlebell workouts!

author: Moiz Malik
text: I like the new layout. A lil bit less space..but more equipments to play with.

author: Danica Tan
text: clean & nice! more equipments added.

author: Christine Leong
text: I would like to thank Tasheen and Predeep for assisting me on my issue with Ezypay. Also would like to thank them for advising on my membership queries. Appreciate it.

author: ellyyy
text: Tried their free trial, small gym but has the necessary equipment, love that they have the stairmaster. Staff is also very accommodating and friendly :)

author: chun kitt
text: Clean and quiet gym. 2 power racks, 1 smith machine. No dedicated platform for deadlift but can do on the ground. Overall enjoyable experience

author: Fajar
text: Staff are friendly and nice! The classes are also very enjoyable. Location is convenient as it's near food and amenities. Equipments are also clean and working well.

author: shrri nathan
text: Small gym but very cozy. Has all the equipment  a gym needs. Good experience

text: I came to enquire regarding gym rates and Mahirah was so friendly and welcoming! Me and my sister had a pleasant experience with her service.
